org.tensorics.core.quantity.operations

Class QuantityAdditiveInversion<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tensorics.core.quantity.operations.AbstractQuantityOperation<S>
      • org.tensorics.core.quantity.operations.QuantityUnaryOperation<S>
        • org.tensorics.core.quantity.operations.QuantityAdditiveInversion<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of scalars on which all the operations are based (elements of a field)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnaryOperation<QuantifiedValue<S>>

    public class QuantityAdditiveInversion<S>
extends QuantityUnaryOperation<S>
    The unary operation which which calculates the additive inversion of a quantity (aka 'the negative'). Error, validity and the unit of the result are the same as the input quantity, only the value itself will be inverted.
